The three sabbaths [an3.70:0.3]: The sabbath of the noble ones
The eight-factored sabbath [an3.70:40.4]: Give up alcoholic drinks that cause negligence
Eat in one part of the day, abstaining from eating at night and food at the wrong time
Avoid dancing, singing, music, and seeing shows; and beautifying and adorning themselves with garlands, fragrance, and makeup
Give up high and luxurious beds
Don’t kill living creatures, steal, or drink alcohol
Don’t eat at night, the wrong time, and sleep on a low bed or a mat on the ground
The different realms and their time scal: The gods of the Four Great Kings
The Gods Who Love to Create
The Gods Who Control the Creations of Others
The different time scales for each realm: Fifty years in the human realm is one day and night for the gods of the Four Great Kings
A hundred years in the human realm is one day and night for the Gods of the Thirty-Three
Two hundred years in the human realm is one day and night for the Gods of Yama
Four hundred years in the human realm is one day and night for the Joyful Gods
Eight hundred years in the human realm is one day and night for the Gods Who Love to Create
Sixteen hundred years in the human realm is one day and night for the Gods Who Control the Creations of Others
